snippet: A man remembered in New York State for an unsuccessful but vivid run for governor in 2010 turned up in New Hampshire to show support for Newt Gingrich.
abstract: Carl P Paladino, who ran vivid but unsuccessful campaign for New York State governor in 2010, arrives in New Hampshire to show support for Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich.
lead_paragraph: A man remembered in New York State for an unsuccessful but vivid run for governor in 2010 turned up in New Hampshire to show support for Newt Gingrich.

headline.seo: Carl P. Paladino, Ever Unpredictable, Stumps for Gingrich
headline.main: Paladino, Ever Unpredictable, Stumps for Gingrich
headline.print_headline: Unscripted Ally Shows Up To Stump for Gingrich
